it.polimi.se2019.virtualView.RMIREDO

Class RmiConnectionHandlerVirtualView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.virtualView.RMIREDO.RmiConnectionHandlerVirtualView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class RmiConnectionHandlerVirtualView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    this class handles the connection received by the rmi server, it sorts them out depending on whether they are new connection or reconnection
    Author:
    LudoLerma, FedericoMainettiGambera

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  RmiConnectionHandlerVirtualView.NewConnection
      if the game still isn't started, the connection received must be a new one a new player is created
      private class  RmiConnectionHandlerVirtualView.Reconnection
      the new connection is a reconnection, if the game has already begun so we understand if the name the user logged in with is one of the AFK player's nickname, if else, it is not possible to reconnect
